verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> be-'ash-tei- eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man יַ֠עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after אָ֨מְרָה <WH559> 'A-me-rah hath said צֹּ֤ר <WH6865> tzor because that Tyrus עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim against Jerusalem הֶאָ֔ח <WH1889> he-'Ach, Aha נִשְׁבְּרָ֛ה <WH7665> nish-be-Rah she is broken דַּלְת֥וֹת <WH1817> dal-Tot [that was] the gates הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim of the people נָסֵ֣בָּה <WH5437> na-Seb-bah she is turned אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; to me אִמָּלְאָ֖ה <WH4390> 'im-mal-'Ah unto me I shall be replenished הָחֳרָֽבָה׃ <WH2717> ho-cho-Ra-vah. [now] she is laid waste

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich I am against צֹ֑ר <WH6865> Tzor; Behold I [am] against thee O Tyrus וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <WH5927> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ti to come up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich against גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, and will cause many כְּהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> ke-ha-'a-Lot to come up הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam against thee as the sea לְגַלָּֽיו׃ <WH1530> le-gal-Lav. causeth his waves

וְשִׁחֲת֞וּ <WH7843> ve-shi-cha-Tu And they shall destroy חֹמ֣וֹת <WH2346> cho-Mot the walls צֹ֗ר <WH6865> Tzor, of Tyrus וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <WH2040> ve-ha-re-Su and break down מִגְדָּלֶ֔יהָ <WH4026> mig-da-Lei-ha, her towers וְסִֽחֵיתִ֥י <WH5500> ve-si-chei-Ti I will also scrape עֲפָרָ֖הּ <WH6083> 'a-fa-Rah her dust מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah; from וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti from her and make אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> o-Tah לִצְחִ֥יחַ <WH6706> litz-Chi-ach her like the top סָֽלַע׃ <WH5553> Sa-la'. of a rock

מִשְׁטַ֨ח <WH4894> mish-Tach It shall be [a place for] the spreading חֲרָמִ֤ים <WH2764> cha-ra-Mim of nets תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> tih-Yeh will become בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hai-Yam, of the sea כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah will become לְבַ֖ז <WH957> le-Vaz and it shall become a spoil לַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> lag-go-Yim. to the nations

וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha And her daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, which [are] in the field בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword תֵּהָרַ֑גְנָה <WH2026> te-ha-Rag-nah; shall be slain וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> choh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> me-Vi Behold I will bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- upon צֹ֗ר <WH6865> Tzor, upon Tyrus נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon from the north מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech a king מְלָכִ֑ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim; of kings בְּס֛וּס <WH5483> be-Sus with horses וּבְרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> u-ve-Re-chev and with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> u-ve-fa-ra-Shim and with horsemen וְקָהָ֥ל <WH6951> ve-ka-Hal and companies וְעַם־ <WH5971> ve-'am- people רָֽב׃ <WH7227> Rav. and much

בְּנוֹתַ֥יִךְ <WH1323> be-no-Ta-yich thy daughters בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev with the sword יַהֲרֹ֑ג <WH2026> ya-ha-Rog; He shall slay וְנָתַ֨ן <WH5414> ve-na-Tan and he shall make עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich against דָּיֵ֗ק <WH1785> da-Yek, a fort וְשָׁפַ֤ךְ <WH8210> ve-sha-Fach against thee and cast עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich against סֹֽלְלָ֔ה <WH5550> so-le-Lah, a mount וְהֵקִ֥ים <WH6965> ve-he-Kim against thee and lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich against צִנָּֽה׃ <WH6793> tzin-Nah. the buckler

וּמְחִ֣י <WH4239> u-me-Chi engines קָֽבָלּ֔וֹ <WH6904> ka-val-Lo, of war יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yit-Ten And he shall set בְּחֹֽמוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH2346> be-cho-mo-Ta-yich; against thy walls וּמִ֨גְדְּלֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH4026> u-Mig-de-lo-Ta-yich, thy towers יִתֹּ֖ץ <WH5422> yit-Totz he shall break down בְּחַרְבוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH2719> be-char-vo-Tav. and with his axes

מִשִּׁפְעַ֥ת <WH8229> mish-shif-'At By reason of the abundance סוּסָ֖יו <WH5483> su-Sav of his horses יְכַסֵּ֣ךְ <WH3680> ye-chas-Sech shall cover אֲבָקָ֑ם <WH80> 'a-va-Kam; their dust מִקּוֹל֩ <WH6963> mik-kOl at the noise פָּרַ֨שׁ <WH6571> pa-Rash of the horsemen וְגַלְגַּ֜ל <WH1534> ve-gal-Gal and of the wheels וָרֶ֗כֶב <WH7393> va-Re-chev, and of the chariots תִּרְעַ֙שְׁנָה֙ <WH7493> tir-'Ash-nah shall shake חֽוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> cho-mo-Ta-yich, thee thy walls בְּבֹאוֹ֙ <WH935> be-vo-'O when he shall enter בִּשְׁעָרַ֔יִךְ <WH8179> bish-'a-Ra-yich, into thy gates כִּמְבוֹאֵ֖י <WH3996> kim-vo-'Ei as men enter עִ֥יר <WH5892> 'ir into a city מְבֻקָּעָֽה׃ <WH1234> me-vuk-ka-'Ah. wherein is made a breach

בְּפַרְס֣וֹת <WH6541> be-far-Sot With the hoofs סוּסָ֔יו <WH5483> su-Sav, of his horses יִרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> yir-Mos shall he tread down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֽוּצוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH2351> chu-tzo-Ta-yich; all thy streets עַמֵּךְ֙ <WH5971> 'am-meCh thy people בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword יַהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> ya-ha-Rog, he shall slay וּמַצְּב֥וֹת <WH4676> u-matz-tze-Vot garrisons עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <WH5797> 'uz-Zech and thy strong לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz to the ground תֵּרֵֽד׃ <WH3381> te-Red. shall go down

וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <WH7997> ve-shal-Lu And they shall make a spoil חֵילֵ֗ךְ <WH2428> chei-Lech, of thy riches וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <WH962> u-va-ze-Zu and make a prey רְכֻלָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH7404> re-chul-la-Tech, of thy merchandise וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <WH2040> ve-ha-re-Su and they shall break down חוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> cho-mo-Ta-yich, thy walls וּבָתֵּ֥י <WH1004> u-vat-Tei houses חֶמְדָּתֵ֖ךְ <WH2532> chem-da-Tech thy pleasant יִתֹּ֑צוּ <WH5422> yit-To-tzu; and destroy וַאֲבָנַ֤יִךְ <WH68> va-'a-va-Na-yich thy stones וְעֵצַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH6086> ve-'e-Tza-yich and thy timber וַֽעֲפָרֵ֔ךְ <WH6083> va-'a-fa-Rech, and thy dust בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch in the midst מַ֖יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of the water יָשִֽׂימוּ׃ <WH7760> ya-Si-mu. and they shall lay

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֖י <WH7673> ve-hish-bat-Ti to cease הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> ha-Mon And I will cause the noise שִׁירָ֑יִךְ <WH7892> shi-Ra-yich; of thy songs וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the sound כִּנּוֹרַ֔יִךְ <WH3658> kin-no-Ra-yich, of thy harps לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> yish-sha-Ma' shall be no more heard עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. more

וּנְתַתִּ֞יךְ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tich And I will make לִצְחִ֣יחַ <WH6706> litz-Chi-ach thee like the top סֶ֗לַע <WH5553> Se-la', of a rock מִשְׁטַ֤ח <WH4894> mish-Tach upon חֲרָמִים֙ <WH2764> cha-ra-Mim nets תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh, become לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no תִבָּנֶ֖ה <WH1129> tib-ba-Neh thou shalt be built ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; more כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. no more for I the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD לְצ֑וֹר <WH6865> le-Tzor; to Tyrus הֲלֹ֣א׀ <WH3808> ha-Lo at מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> mik-Kol at the sound מַפַּלְתֵּ֗ךְ <WH4658> map-pal-Tech, of thy fall בֶּאֱנֹ֨ק <WH602> be-'e-Nok cry חָלָ֜ל <WH2491> cha-Lal when the wounded בֵּהָ֤רֵֽג <WH2026> be-Ha-reg is made הֶ֙רֶג֙ <WH2027> he-reg when the slaughter בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> be-to-Chech, in the midst יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> yir-'a-Shu shake הָאִיִּֽים׃ <WH339> ha-'i-Yim. Shall not the isles

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <WH3381> ve-ya-re-Du shall come down מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from כִּסְאוֹתָ֗ם <WH3678> kis-'o-Tam, from their thrones כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> ne-si-'Ei Then all the princes הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hai-Yam, of the sea וְהֵסִ֙ירוּ֙ <WH5493> ve-he-Si-ru and lay away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְעִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4598> me-'I-lei-Hem, their robes וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> big-Dei garments רִקְמָתָ֖ם <WH7553> rik-ma-Tam their broidered יִפְשֹׁ֑טוּ <WH6584> yif-Sho-tu; and put off חֲרָד֤וֹת׀ <WH2731> cha-ra-Dot themselves with trembling יִלְבָּ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH3847> yil-Ba-shu they shall clothe עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz upon the ground יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <WH3427> ye-She-vu, they shall sit וְחָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH2729> ve-cha-re-Du and shall tremble לִרְגָעִ֔ים <WH7281> lir-ga-'Im, at [every] moment וְשָׁמְמ֖וּ <WH8074> ve-sha-me-Mu and be astonished עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich. and

וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> ve-na-se-'U And they shall take up עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich over קִינָה֙ <WH7015> ki-Nah a lamentation וְאָ֣מְרוּ <WH559> ve-'A-me-ru for thee and say לָ֔ךְ Lach, אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> 'eich How אָבַ֔דְתְּ <WH6> 'a-Vadt, to thee How art thou destroyed נוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> no-She-vet [that wast] inhabited מִיַּמִּ֑ים <WH3220> mi-yam-Mim; of seafaring men הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir city הַהֻלָּ֗לָה <WH1984> ha-hul-La-lah, the renowned אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher Which הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become חֲזָקָ֤ה <WH2389> cha-za-Kah which wast strong בַיָּם֙ <WH3220> vai-Yam in the sea הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi and her וְיֹשְׁבֶ֔יהָ <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei-ha, she and her inhabitants אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Who נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu which cause חִתִּיתָ֖ם <WH2851> chit-ti-Tam their terror לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all יוֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3427> yo-she-Vei-ha. [to be] on all that haunt

עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now יֶחְרְד֣וּ <WH2729> yech-re-Du tremble הָֽאִיִּ֔ן <WH339> ha-'i-Yin, Now shall the isles י֖וֹם <WH3117> Yom in the day מַפַּלְתֵּ֑ךְ <WH4658> map-pal-Tech; of thy fall וְנִבְהֲל֛וּ <WH926> ve-niv-ha-Lu shall be troubled הָאִיִּ֥ים <WH339> ha-'i-Yim yea the isles אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which בַּיָּ֖ם <WH3220> bai-Yam that [are] in the sea מִצֵּאתֵֽךְ׃ <WH3318> mitz-tze-Tech. at thy departure ס sa-Mek
